jp.kshoji.javax.sound.midi

Interface Sequencer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MidiDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SequencerImpl

    public interface Sequencer
extends MidiDevice
    Interface for MIDI Sequencer
    Author:
    K.Shoji

      • getLoopCount

        int getLoopCount()
        Get the count of loop.
        Returns:
        the count of loop
        • LOOP_CONTINUOUSLY: play loops eternally
        • 0: play once(no loop)
        • 1: play twice(loop once)

      • setLoopCount

        void setLoopCount(int count)
        Set count of loop.
        Parameters:
        count -
        • LOOP_CONTINUOUSLY: play loops eternally
        • 0: play once(no loop)
        • 1: play twice(loop once)

      • getLoopStartPoint

        long getLoopStartPoint()
        Get start point(ticks) of loop.
        Returns:
        ticks

      • setLoopStartPoint

        void setLoopStartPoint(long tick)
        Set start point(ticks) of loop.
        Parameters:
        tick - 0: start of Sequence

      • getLoopEndPoint

        long getLoopEndPoint()
        Get the end point(ticks) of loop.
        Returns:
        the end point(ticks) of loop

      • setLoopEndPoint

        void setLoopEndPoint(long tick)
        Set end point(ticks) of loop.
        Parameters:
        tick - -1: end of Sequence

      • getTempoFactor

        float getTempoFactor()
        Get the tempo factor.
        Returns:
        the tempo factor

      • setTempoFactor

        void setTempoFactor(float factor)
        Set the tempo factor. This method don't change Sequence's tempo.
        Parameters:
        factor -
        • 1.0f : the normal tempo
        • 0.5f : half slow tempo
        • 2.0f : 2x fast tempo

      • getTempoInBPM

      • setTrackMute

                  boolean mute)
        Set the track to mute on the playback.

        mute - true to set mute the track

      • setTrackSolo

                  boolean solo)
        Set track to solo on the playback.
        Parameters:
        track - the track number
        solo - true to set solo the track

      • start

        void start()
        Start playing (starting at current sequencer position)

      • startRecording

        void startRecording()
        Start recording (starting at current sequencer position)

        Current Sequence's events are sent to the all Transmitter. Received events art also sent to the all Transmitter.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop playing AND recording.

      • stopRecording

        void stopRecording()
        Stop recording. Playing continues.
